name: QuoteoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
We all need a little inspiration to start our day. The words of the greats can get us starting on the right path. 

Start your day with an inspirational quote from some of history's most influential people.

Just ask "Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing" to receive your daily quote.

Quote of the day is brought to you from billclantonbooks.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
